title: FS T206 Rube Oldring Batting POLAR BEAR PSA 6 POP1^1
author: imdaman1964

posts.post_title: FS T206 Rube Oldring Batting POLAR BEAR PSA 6 POP1^1
posts.post_content:
Scarce sole example of Polar Bear Oldring Batting in PSA 6 w/low overall POP

Highest graded PSA 7 sold in 2019 @ Heritage for over $1500 
This copy presents better in my opinion w/ super clean reverse and only a speck on front magnified by scan. Can send more pix on request that do the card justice

Reduced to $750 delivered via PP F&F

Thanks
Wayne
